description: Police say a black Mercedes crashed into the Edinburgh Woollen Mill's shopfront at about 13:05 GMT.
title: Southport: Mercedes crashes into Edinburgh Woollen Mill shopfront
title_page: Southport: Mercedes crashes into Edinburgh Woollen Mill shopfront - BBC News
maintext:
A car has crashed into a shop in Southport, police have said.
A black Mercedes smashed into the front of the Edinburgh Woollen Mill store on Lord Street shortly shortly after 13:00 GMT, said Merseyside Police.
Merseyside Fire and Rescue assisted at the scene as police temporarily closed the road.
The Mercedes driver remained at the scene, police said, and there were no reports of any injuries.
